text: <@U7SL518D6> I was hoping to get the values set by users after editing so it's not really the file that I need but the ends result of that file. It would really make all of the difference if users could edit content in the same way but that content was available in JS so that I can use, in my specific case, Svelte to manage it
Yes...but without the data-attributes. It probably doesn't exist. I think it would be considered a headless CMS if it did exist
I want to keep the general editing experience but use Svelte to deal with everything
